messages.content: To test MongoDB integration via API in the context of Austrian legal documents, you may want to focus on the relevant architectural and building regulations that govern data handling and storage. Key documents include the ÖNORM B 1800, which outlines area calculations, and the OIB-Richtlinien, particularly OIB-RL 4 regarding accessibility and safety standards. These documents provide guidelines on how data related to building dimensions and safety must be managed and stored. Ensure your API can handle data types and structures that comply with these regulations. For further details, you can refer to the specific sections of the ÖNORM and OIB guidelines that pertain to data management in construction and architectural contexts.
